unnormalised: "Imagine a biryani stall near Charminar," explains Dr. Anjali Sharma, a leading supply chain consultant. "If they misjudge the demand during Ramadan, they'll either face massive wastage or disappoint hungry customers. Similarly, manufacturers need granular forecasting."
